items.sentence: Tom has donated a lot of money to various charities.
Tom tried to convince Mary to go to Boston with him.
In the afternoon, we played volleyball on the beach.
Other than you, I don\'t have any friends in Boston.
Tom is wearing the same clothes as he was yesterday.
I doubt very seriously that Tom did that on purpose.
My wife and I did our Christmas shopping in October.
Tom won\'t come to work today because he has a cold.
We\'re going to eat as soon as we finish doing this.
We\'ve improved the quality of many of our products.
